attributes.action: ensure a general election is called when the incumbent Prime Minister gives way to a new Prime Minister without a public electoral mandate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any new Prime Minister that replaces the encumbent prime minister whilst still in office must go to the polls to receive (or not) a public mandate on the change within  eight months of taking office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
